metadata.title: CVE-2022-28948 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An issue in the Unmarshal function in Go-Yaml v3 causes the program tocrash when attempting to deserialize invalid input.

criterions.comment: snapd: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
